partial_orders.reason: Both edits remove assignments to the same variable ALLOW_REGISTER in different branches of the same if-else statement. This is a synchronized removal operation where both lines reference the exact same symbol (ALLOW_REGISTER) and are part of a single, contiguous refactoring task to eliminate this variable assignment from both conditional branches. The edits are mechanically linked through the identical symbol being removed and would naturally be performed together as part of the same micro-task.
